products.title: Scintillating Silver Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: This scintillating silver venetian blind has a sparkling textured finish to add a little flourish to your contemporary conservatory. The futuristic facade will add an extra element of glamour to your decor.

products.description: This oak coloured venetian blind has a versatile mid tone that will complement a variety of colour schemes and wood shades. The slat is dark biscuit in colour with a grain of deeper toffee running through.
